Method Detail

getRetryCount

int getRetryCount()
Returns:
the remaining number of retry attempts. When this method returns 0, request is not retried anymore.

retry

void retry(SpiceException e)

getDelayBeforeRetry

long getDelayBeforeRetry()
Returns:
the delay to sleep between each retry attempt (in ms).
